entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:51 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 12:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 7 except minus 12 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 7 except minus 12 in low lying areas. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
